abstracts.cdata!:
Project ratings are as follows: Project
            outcome is unsatisfactory; sustainability is unlikely;
            institutional development impact is negligible; Bank
            performance is satisfactory; and Borrower performance is
            unsatisfactory. Lessons cited from the project included the
            following: The Borrower's ownership of project
            development objectives is critical; incorporating previous
            lessons into project design is essential; the outbreak of a
            crisis may result in undermining resistance to change,
            making a country more receptive to advice and eager to try
            international good practices;  establishment of proper
            system for managing, monitoring and evaluating project
            operations is crucial; realistic periods of extensions for
            project implementation should be considered in difficult
            situations; and autonomous or semi-autonomous project
            implementation units offer several advantages.
